candidates.title: feat: add divindel bias for detecting artifacts caused by diverging indels associated with the alt allele
candidates.body:
### Description

This can for example detect PCR amplication errors on homopolymer runs. But also artifacts in weird repetetive regions.

* Rename estimate tmb subcommand into estimate mutational-burden ([#182](https://www.github.com/varlociraptor/varlociraptor/issues/182)) ([9fa5a1f](https://www.github.com/varlociraptor/varlociraptor/commit/9fa5a1f6cb58d37c9fdf5c235ae035cf096b10a0))

candidates.title: fix: merging of VAFRanges
candidates.body:
The merge of two `VAFRange`s in `FormulaTerminal` which was supposed to result in the intersection (i.e. conjunction) of the two ranges but actually resulted in the union (i.e. disjunction). 
This PR fixes that behaviour for merging conjunctions.
However, there may also be certain disjunction cases (such as overlapping ranges) which ought to be merged when normalizing, e.g. `normal:[0.0, 0.5] | normal:[0.5, 1.0]` can be merged to `normal[0.0,1.0]`. I'll hence leave this as a draft for now.

candidates.title: Automatically anonymize testcases
candidates.body:
This
* replaces read names with uuids
* replaces sequences in reads reference and alleles with a random permutation (of course the same for all three types).
* replaces any paths in the recorded preprocessing options with "?"

Also, unnecessary header records are removed now.

candidates.title: implement BDD based simplification, and automatic referral of events
use hashing instead of ordering for checking and caching events
Fix prior cache
candidates.body: Avoids an endless filling of the prior cache for complex scenarios.

candidates.title: Support for obtaining read orientation from BAM tag `RO:Z`
implement read position bias
candidates.body:
In addition:
* speedup bias estimation by not anymore considering combinations of biases.
* add a prior for biases compared to no biases (0.5 / 0.5), and an internal uniform prior for all considered biases.
* skip biases that cannot be observed.
* special case skipping for read orientation bias in case there is no direct observation of the orientation at question from any ALT read pair.
* code cleanup and refactoring
